# {dashboard}

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {dashboard} is to present an overview of open-source activity of the easystats team.

This is adapted from [ThinkR-open dashboard](https://github.com/ThinkR-open/dashboard), which itself relies on [Jim Hester tidyverse Dashboard](https://github.com/jimhester/tidyversedashboard).
